segments.text: Let's go to the cinema tonight , shall we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Is there a good movie on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about ' Farewell My Concubine ' ? I've been wanting to see it for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . But it'll be difficult to buy tickets I suppose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My brother has offered me two tickets for this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll come for you at about eight .
segments.speaker: S2
